chart_analysis.recommendation: A grouped horizontal bar chart allows direct comparison of the number of fast-growing companies across metros and cities, grouped by industry. This format lets users easily read rank order, compare relative concentration, and see industry breakdowns for each metro/city. It is ideal because users can quickly spot leading locations and how company representation shifts by industry.
chart_analysis.target_audience_considerations: Business leaders, policy makers, and analysts need to easily identify top-performing metros and cities, and understand the composition by industry. The grouped horizontal bar chart directly fits their mental model for stacked/side-by-side comparisons and avoids clutter since industry is used for color grouping.
chart_analysis.key_message: The visualization conveys which metros and cities host the most fast-growing companies, with a breakdown by industry, making patterns and concentrations immediately visible.

chart_encodings.x: company_count (number of companies per metro/city, per industry)
chart_encodings.y: metro (main axis, sorted by total company_count)
chart_encodings.color: industry (each grouped bar has a different color for industry)
chart_encodings.facet: city (optional, as a label or secondary grouping within metro)
